TopSim Pipelines¶

This set of pages describes the processes underlying the generation of TopSim configuration files and pipelines. These pipelines form the basis of experiments used to evaluate different scheduling approaches’ performance when applied to workflow scheduling for the Square Kilometre Array Sciene Data Processor (SKA SDP).

Pipelines are generated based on information including the observation schedule, theoretical system sizing of pipeline components, and a Logical Graph Template produced by the EAGLE online graph editor.

The source coderepository is found under the http://github/top-sim/ organisation.
